header.under: Your simple multi purpose Discord bot. Free and <1>open source</1> forever.

votes.heading: Votes
votes.description: Want to settle a dispute or make a decision? Let your members vote on it. You can create polls with multiple options and all with Discords new message components.

autovoice.heading: Automatic voice channels
autovoice.description: Create voice channels by simply joining a voice channel. Don't worry about leftovers, they will be deleted automatically.

discover.header: And much more to be discovered ...
